metadata.title: CVE-2019-9924 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
rbash in Bash before 4.4-beta2 did not prevent the shell user frommodifying BASH_CMDS, thus allowing the user to execute any command with thepermissions of the shell.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9924` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bash - 4.3-14ubuntu1.4
bash-builtins - 4.3-14ubuntu1.4
bash-static - 4.3-14ubuntu1.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: bash package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.3-14ubuntu1.4').
